accueil.title: Welcome to
accueil.desc: This site offers you to discover two travel areas in the Grand Est region!
accueil.metz.title: Discover Metz
accueil.metz.desc: Capital of Lorraine, Metz offers you the charm of its buildings like its station or its cathedral!
accueil.stras.title: Discover Strasbourg
accueil.stras.desc: Capital of Alsace and of the European corridor, live the Alsatian adventure in this city of tradition!
accueil.ge.title: Tourism in the Grand Est
accueil.ge.desc: A unique region, let your curiosity tempt you and visit us tomorrow!
stats.title: Rate of site visits
contact.desc: Hello, I'm Eliot! I'm in my 3rd year of a computer science degree and I designed this website about tourist discoveries in the Grand Est region! I hope you will enjoy it!
